BuiltInRoles.Name: Admins
BuiltInRoles.Description: Can do everything that Citizen Developers and Managers can. Also, an admin can create other Admin, Developer or Manager accounts

BuiltInRoles.Name: Citizen Developers
BuiltInRoles.Description: Creates the application screens and the business logic/flows associated with them

BuiltInRoles.Name: Managers
BuiltInRoles.Description: Has access to all data stored in the system. Can manage all users except Admins and Citizen Developers

AppRoles.Name: Users
AppRoles.Description: The normal users of this App
